INTRODUCTION

In this section we introduce the economic model of demand and supply — one of the most powerful models in all of economics.

Watch the following video clips for an introduction on why we study this model and what it is about.

In the section that follows we will study the following key elements of the demand and supply model:

  • Demand and law of demand
  • Factors that cause demand to change
  • Supply and law of supply
  • Factors that cause supply to change
  • Market Equilibrium
  • Adjustment process to reach market equilibrium
